title: Shocking Connections In The Deep State Takedown of Giuliani (Ep 1514)
description:
More explosive connections between the deep-state swamp rats targeting Rudy Giuliani. In this episode, I discuss the troubling connections, and what they’re hiding. I also address the latest decision by communist Facebook, and the Biden gaffe machine. 

News Picks:


The REAL reasons behind the Rudy Giuliani raid. 

Left-wing, radical Facebook continues to crush free speech by upholding the ban on President Trump’s account.

Is this the real origin story of COVID-19?


Ron DeSantis strikes again. 

Opponents of racist “critical race theory” win a huge victory.

A story about Mary McCord’s husband.
